headline: GOP Senate candidates take part in live forum
author: Anna Ashcraft
sentences:
For news delivered right to you, subscribe to JET 24/FOX 66/YourErie.com’s breaking, daily news & severe weather email lists
The Primary Election in Pennsylvania will take place May 17, 2022.
The four candidates — Kathy Barnette, Jeff Bartos, Dave McCormick and Dr. Mehmet Oz — took part in the live forum from 9 to 10 a.m. on Wednesday, March 30.
Wednesday, four Republican candidates for U.S. Senate took part in a live forum on YourErie.com.
Jezree Friend of the Manufacturer and Business Association (MBA) was the moderator of the forum.
(WJET/WFXP/YourErie.com) — Republican candidates looking to replace retiring Republican U.S.
Senator Pat Toomey were in Erie on March 30.
Watch the full replay in the player above.
To register to vote, visit vote.pa.gov.
Voters must register to vote by May 2.
